content:
Certainly!

Homeowner Persona:
Name: Sarah
Age: 35
Occupation: Marketing Manager
Family: Married with two young children
Location: Sydney, NSW
Budget: $800,000

Scenario:
Sarah and her husband are looking to build their dream home in a suburb of Sydney. They've saved up a budget of $800,000 and want to make sure they choose the right builder to ensure the construction of their dream home goes smoothly. Sarah has heard horror stories from friends who have had issues with their builders and wants to make sure she avoids any potential problems. She's started researching local builders in NSW and has scheduled some interviews with potential builders. She wants to make sure she asks the right questions during these interviews and is aware of any red flags to watch out for when choosing a builder.
